member.param: The index of the old item.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Implementation.XamSparkline.PixelScalingRatio
member.summary: Gets or sets the scaling value used to affect the pixel density of the control.
member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Controls.Charts.Implementation.XamSparkline.ActualPixelScalingRatio
member.summary: Gets the actual scaling value used by the component to affect the pixel density of the control.
member.remarks: A higher scaling ratio will produce crisper visuals at the expense of memory. Lower values will cause the control to appear blurry.
